https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3220Mn1llRXWUHFG2fW6r4O7pXC.jpg A teen with superhero powers leads an underground group formed to bring down the establishment after the mayor of New York City intensifies police brutality towards blacks and calls for a citywide purge. Dragon: The Weapon of God
